---
name: Mod request
about: Request that a mod be added to the modpack. Include compatibility checks and license/author info.
title: "[MOD REQUEST] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: []
---

Please fill out the details below to request adding a mod to the pack.

## Mod information

- **Mod name:**
- **Author / maintainer:**
- **Link (CurseForge / Modrinth / GitHub / other):**
- **Exact file / release you propose (link):**
- **Suggested version:**

## Compatibility checklist (please check before filing)

- [ ] Mod is compatible with the modpack Minecraft version: **(state version tested)**
- [ ] Mod is compatible with the modloader & version used by this pack (e.g., Forge/Fabric/Quilt/Neoforge + version)
- [ ] Any required dependencies are listed below and are compatible

## License / author permission

- [ ] I confirm the mod's license allows inclusion in a distribution (modpack) OR the author has given permission
- [ ] I'm unsure about the license and need help confirming

If you answered "unsure", please paste the license link or the author's statement here.

## Why should this mod be included?
Explain briefly what the mod adds, why it fits the theme or gameplay of the pack, and what problem it solves or experience it enriches.

## Alternatives and considerations

- Have you checked for similar mods already included in the pack? If yes, list them and explain why this is preferable.
- Any required configuration changes or recommended settings?
